head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCGOVERN, NANCY F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCGOVERN, NANCY F.

block.p: McGOVERN--Nancy F., 84, July 26, 1922 to June 10, 2007. Wife of J. Stuart McGovern, mother, grandmother; KathArine, William, Kathy Lee and William Jr. From Greenwich and Palm Beach, has passed after a long illness. Very active volunteer in many charitable organizations in Larchmont, Minnesota, Greenwich and Palm Beach. Memorial services Monday, June 18, Lourdes McKeen Chapel, West Palm Beach at 11am. And St. Michael's, Greenwich, CT, June 23 at 11:30am. Please bring stories and pictures. In lieu of flowers, donations to Palm Beach Hospice. No more pain. Rest in Peace Mom and Dad. Love, Bill and Kath

And St. Michael's, Greenwich, CT, June 23 at 11:30am. Please bring stories and pictures. In lieu of flowers, donations to Palm Beach Hospice. No more pain. Rest in Peace Mom and Dad.
